data.text:
We have visited this hotel as to celebrate our wedd anniversary and we did not regreat it at all.
The hotel is very well located .
We had a warm welcome with a glass of a refreshing drink. The room was spacius, very clean .
The bathroom was also big, clean and full of all neaded anenities.
They had also a basket of fruits and a bottle of wine as welcome.
We enjoyed the refreshing swim on the beach and uppon our return we also had a treat with a platter full of cheese fruits e.t.c 
The dinner was fantastic and very romantic .
The breakfast buffet is perfect and the atmosphere if the breakfast area very nice.
The staff is excellent and they are ready to assist you with a smile.
Congratulations to all of you for the hard work and your effort to make our stay one to remember.
data.title: Thank you for the wonderful stay

data.text:
I had high expectations due to the great reviews. An adult only resort was nice. No kids! 

We arrived around midnight as our flight departed slightly late from the UK. Distance from airport to the resort was only 30-40 minutes.

Private transfer is a highly recommended but there is a cost.

On arrival we had a warm welcome.

We had chosen the bungalow with side sea view and outdoor whirlpool. Our room was 1801 and it wasn’t the side sea view as expected and described. 

There were ants in the bedroom. We found hair in the bedding. This was resolved and rectified.

The resort is beautiful.

My only issue was the food. Breakfast was awful. Not everyone eats cheese or meat. The lack of variety and options was disappointing. I love my food and I wasn’t happy. The food only caters for European people. 

Staff were really nice and accommodating.

It was our wedding anniversary and I’m grateful for the nice gestures by the hotel.
data.title: A decent break

data.text: Really enjoyable stay, service and food were exemplary.  The staff were exceptionally friendly and helpful especially George the customer services representative.  We stayed in a room with shared pool which was very nice.  When we arrived there was a slight problem with the shower drain being blocked which was dealt with immediately.  It was a lovely hotel to stay in and would not hesitate to recommend to friends and family.
data.title: Wonderful Hotel

user_location.name: Ashby de la Zouch, Leicestershire, England

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear 52gill47,

We are thrilled to read that you enjoyed your stay with us.

Your kind words regarding service, food and our staff are greatly appreciated, and we look forward to sharing them with our team.

Thanks for taking the time to comment on your stay and we hope to see you again in the future.

With warm regards
Your Sentido Port Royal Villas & Spa Hotel Team
owner_response.author: K H

data.text:
Port Royal is simply fabulous - their kind and friendly staff are always aiming to deliver with exceptional quality service and care. 
The delicious food menu and dishes on offer caters for everyone’s needs, including vegan and vegetarian wishes.
A superb hotel, amazingly situated on a beach front with everything you need close to hand. 
The spa is fabulous and offers a welcoming break for additional R&R. 
The pool is exceptionally special when it’s viewed at nighttime - a starlight affair ✨ 
We return year after year because we are guaranteed an amazing holiday experience. Thank you Port Royal ☺️
data.title: Fabulous holiday experience year upon year - never fails to deliver 100% care and quality

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear melanyp144,

Guest satisfaction is our number one goal and there is nothing better than achieving that!

We are glad that we were able to come up to your expectations once again and that you enjoyed the delicious food, the friendliness of our staff along with your spa experience.
Your kind words on the hotel location and sparkling pool ambience are deeply appreciated.

We look forward to welcoming you again and thank you for your motivating feedback.

With our warmest regards

Your Sentido Port Royal Villas & Spa Hotel Team
owner_response.author: K H

data.text: A beautiful, quiet hotel with modern, luxurious facilities. The staff were welcoming, kind and generous. We felt at home from the moment we arrived. The hotel is situated perfectly between Rhodes Town and Lindos. A short, reasonable ride on the local bus takes you to either of these ancient towns. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay here and cannot recommend it enough. We will certainly return in the future! A huge thank you to all of the staff for making our stay a memorable one.
data.title: Luxurious Hotel in Rhodes

owner_response.title: Owner response

We were enchanted to have you with us and hope to see you again soon.

Warmest Regards
Your Sentido Port Royal Villas & Spa Hotel Team
